name: 2023 The 6th International Conference on Big Data and Education
content: Conference Proceedings: We welcome and encourage the submission of high-quality, original papers, which are not being submitted simultaneously for publication elsewhere. ICBDE 2023 welcomes submission of papers concerning any branch of the Big Data and Education, and their applications ineducation, and other subjects. The subjects covered by the ICBDE 2022 include Big Data Applications, Big Data Algorithms, E-learning, Online Education, Digital Classrooms, Big Data Mining and Analytics and so on. Accepted papers of ICBDE 2023 after proper registration and presentation will be published in the ICBDE 2023 conference proceedings.
